gui_camera_bindings package¶

Submodules¶

gui_camera_bindings.controller module¶

class gui_camera_bindings.controller.Controller(main_window, camera: MachineVisionCamera)¶

Bases: Ui_MainWindow

Controller class that inherits the Ui_MainWindow from the autogenerated pyqt ui file

Parameters:

  • main_window – instace of the current main window

  • camera – instance of the MachineVisionCamera
